-e ---

𓃗 Pegasus 𓊃𓊃𓅓 'ass-mare
𓃗 mare mère ♀
𓃘 mule male ♂ 马驴 mǎlu 牡骡 mǔluó
𓃘 𒀲 ANŠE onager ass 󳬹 󳬺 󳬻 󳬼 󳬽 󳬾 󳬿 󳭀 󳭁 󳥺 󳢞 󳢟 󳢠 󳢡 󳢢 󳢣

𐀂 -𐀡-𐀡-𐀦-𐀂-𐀤 ʰi-po-po hippo horse 𐀂-𐀡-𐀡-𐀦-𐀂-𐀤 iᵍ-po-po equus horse

󳈑 󳥺 𓌝 quadriga > 󳥎 troika > 󳈐 team > 󳈏 ass

𓃗 𒀲 gir16 घोड़ा ghoṛā 𒆳𒊏 kur+ra (sisi) ass

𒍽 ḪUŠ ⋍ horse in lakpilan 𒍽𒉿𒆷𒀭 lak-pi-la-an horse (equine)
𒍽 ḪUŠ ⋍ Ross ≈ rosa red in Rosengold

𓃗 घोड़ा ghoṛā Gaul khuras धेड़ा horse

𒄊𒀯 suhub2 Hufe hoof @ horse

𒀲𒆳𒊏 {anše} kur+ra ghoṛā "horse" khuras: 𒀲𒆳𒊏𒍑 {anše} kur+ra+uš khuras "horse" 𒀲𒆳𒊏𒍑 {anše} kur+ra+uš ᵉkhuras ekkus equus "horse" 𒀲𒍣𒍣 {ghoṛā} si₂si₂ horses 𒀲𒍣 𒍣 {ghoṛā} si₂si₂ סוּס sus סוסיא sūsyā’ ܣܘܼܣܵܐ susa ܣܘܼܣܬܵܐ susta 𒀲𒍣𒍣 {Pferg} si₂si₂ Pegasus
